Class TownyEconomyObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.palmergames.bukkit.towny.object.TownyObject
      • com.palmergames.bukkit.towny.object.TownyEconomyObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Nation, TownBlockOwner, WarSpoils

    public class TownyEconomyObject
extends TownyObject
    Economy object which provides an interface with the Economy Handler.
    Author:
    ElgarL, Shade
